name: Youporn Video Downloader
tagline: Save Youporn videos instantly for offline viewing.
description: YouPorn Video Downloader analyses each video page, pulls every quality option YouPorn exposes, and saves the stream as an MP4—whether it’s a direct file or an HLS playlist. Just pick your resolution, let the extension handle headers and conversion, and the finished video lands in your downloads folder ready for offline viewing.
seo_title: Youporn Video Downloader | Download Youporn Videos
seo_description: Download Youporn videos easily for offline viewing. Fast, reliable Youporn video downloader with high-quality downloads.

screenshots.alt: Queue of Youporn downloads ready for export
Download quality selection controls for Youporn videos
Youporn Video Downloader automation settings panel

features: Parses YouPorn pages to uncover full quality lists, including hidden HD variants
Downloads direct MP4 files when available and converts HLS streams when necessary
Labels each option with resolution, format, and estimated size for easy selection
Shows real-time progress and status, including conversion stages for streaming sources
Supports Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on desktop with local-only processing
Stores licence data locally with no analytics or third-party routing

pricing.label: One-time payment
pricing.note: Lifetime licence with dual MP4/HLS workflow and progress tracking. Sales are final.
benefits: Save YouPorn videos in the exact quality you want without external sites
Capture streams even when only HLS playback is available
Keep downloads private thanks to 100% on-device processing

faqs.question: How do I download a YouPorn video with this extension?
faqs.answer: Open the video, click the downloader icon, choose the format/resolution you prefer, and keep the tab open while the progress bar completes. The MP4 saves automatically.

faqs.question: What happens if only streaming formats are available?
faqs.answer: The downloader detects when only HLS is present, fetches the segments, and merges them into a standard MP4 without any extra steps from you.

faqs.question: Can I queue multiple downloads?
faqs.answer: Downloads run one at a time so conversion stays reliable. Start the next video once the current download finishes.

faqs.question: Which browsers are supported?
faqs.answer: Builds are available for Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Brave, and Opera on Windows, macOS, and Linux desktops.

faqs.question: Does it change the video or remove watermarks?
faqs.answer: No. The tool saves the original content exactly as YouPorn provides it—whether that’s a direct MP4 or the merged result of a stream.

faqs.question: Is my activity private?
faqs.answer: All detection and conversion happens locally. The extension only validates your licence and never uploads viewing or download history.

reviews.name: Evan Shore
reviews.review: When MP4 wasn’t available it switched to HLS and still delivered a perfect file. No manual work required.
reviews.title: Streaming fallback is clutch

reviews.name: Lana Ortiz
reviews.review: Tells me if an option is direct MP4 or streaming. I grab 1080p every time and it never fails.
reviews.title: Quality labels make choosing easy

reviews.name: Darius Cole
reviews.review: Progress stays accurate and the final video plays flawlessly on my tablet.
reviews.title: Dependable for offline viewing

permission_justifications.justification:
Streams the final MP4 to your downloads folder and keeps the progress display
in sync for each video.

Stores licence activation, preferred quality, and conversion settings locally
so the downloader stays configured between sessions.

Detects the YouPorn player on the page you’re viewing and injects the quality/format
selector.

Allows the extension to refresh download options as you navigate between videos
without losing progress.

Extracts video metadata, MP4 URLs, and HLS manifests from the player so the downloader
can fetch the correct stream.

Sends completion and error alerts so you know when a download finishes or needs
attention.

Adds an optional right-click “Download with YouPorn Video Downloader” menu item
for quick saves.

Merges HLS segments into MP4 files in the background, keeping the active tab responsive
during conversion.

Grants scoped access to youporn.com and related CDN domains required to retrieve
video files.
